name: CreateDatabase
body:
CREATE DATABASE $DatabaseName$
ON PRIMARY --PRIMARY FileGroup is Default Group
	( 
		NAME = $DatabaseName$_data,
		FILENAME = '$DataFileLocationPath$\$DatabaseName$_Data.mdf',
		SIZE = $DataFileInitialSize_KB$KB,
		FILEGROWTH = $DataFileGrowthSize_KB$KB
	),
   FILEGROUP $FileGroupName$ --SECONDARY FileGroup will be Created Automatically
	( 
		NAME = $DatabaseName$_data2,
		FILENAME = '$DataFileLocationPath$\$DatabaseName$_Data2.mdf',
		SIZE = $DataFileInitialSize_KB$KB,
		FILEGROWTH = $DataFileGrowthSize_KB$KB
	) -- Add Additional Files in FileGroups If Required
LOG ON
	(
		NAME = $DatabaseName$_log,
		FILENAME = '$LogFileLocationPath$\$DatabaseName$_Log.ldf',
		SIZE = $LogFileInitialSize_KB$KB,
		FILEGROWTH = $LogFileGrowthSize_KB$KB --(or) FILEGROWTH = 10%
	)
;
GO
